revised_title: Tidal Friction of a Planet with Multiple Satellites and the Evolution of the Solar System
tldr: The author investigates the tidal friction of a planet attended by multiple satellites and its impact on the evolution of the solar system. The study considers the effects of tidal friction on the configuration and rotation of the planet, as well as the orbital dynamics of the satellites. The findings suggest that tidal friction plays a significant role in the evolution of planetary masses and the overall stability of the solar system.
